sink.preCopyScript:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'CustomerSource' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.CustomerSource;
END

IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'CustomerSource' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
BEGIN
    TRUNCATE TABLE dbo.CustomerSource;
END

text.value: @concat('INSERT INTO dbo.image_log (image_name, image_url, ingest_tme) VALUES (''', item(), ''', ''https://storageacchanif.blob.core.windows.net/development/json_file/', item(), ''', GETDATE());')
